entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
